sentences.en: A constitutional amendment precludes any president from serving more than two terms.
sentences.cn: 一项宪法修正案使得任何总统的任职不得超过两届。

sentences.en: Constitutional changes are exclusively the prerogative of the parliament.
sentences.cn: 修改宪法是议会独有的权力。

sentences.en: Important questions of constitutional law were involved.
sentences.cn: 其中涉及到有关宪法的一些重大问题。

sentences.en: It is not constitutional to censor the press.
sentences.cn: 审查新闻是违反宪法的.

sentences.en: No doubt the courts will continue to rely heavily on the constitutional text.
sentences.cn: 毫无疑问,法院将继续依靠宪法的主文.

sentences.en: Over the next few years he distinguished himself as a leading constitutional scholar.
sentences.cn: 在接下来的几年里，他作为一名宪法研究领域最杰出的学者而声名远扬。

sentences.en: Parliament was accused of constitutional impropriety.
sentences.cn: 议会被指控有违宪行为.

sentences.en: President Lincoln reiterated his constitutional doctrine.
sentences.cn: 林肯总统重新申述他对宪法的看法.

sentences.en: The effort collapsed both in constitutional theory and in practice.
sentences.cn: 这种尝试在宪法上找不到理论根据,实践上也不成功.
此举超出了宪法的规定范围。

sentences.en: The purpose was to define the constitutional position.
sentences.cn: 目的是确立议会的宪法性地位.

sentences.en: They claimed that the new law was not constitutional.
sentences.cn: 他们声称这项新法律不符合宪法。

sentences.en: They continue their groping towards a constitutional settlement.
sentences.cn: 他们继续寻求合乎宪法规定的解决方案。

sentences.en: They reflect legal or constitutional norms.
sentences.cn: 它们反映了法律或宪法准则.

sentences.en: This chapter will explore the statutory and constitutional implications of these restrictions.
sentences.cn: 本章将探索这些限制的法令和宪法含义.

words.tran_cn: 基本的；本质的；制定的；构成分子的
立宪；立宪主义，立宪制度

phrases.tran_cn: 宪法惯例；制宪会议；1787年美国制宪会议（Constitutional Convention）

trans.tran_en: connected with the constitution of a country or organization
a walk you take because it is good for your health
